credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
style: Early 17th c needle lace and style
title: Fragments
description: Fragments with alternating arrangements of floral and foliated sprays in a symmetric pattern connected by brides. Pattern outlined by cordonnet and interspersed by portes, enchainettes and point mignon.
name: Fragments
